sentences.en: A foolish consistency is the hobgoblin of little minds.
sentences.cn: 令人讨厌的小人物身上有着愚蠢的一致性.

sentences.en: Add milk to produce a soft dropping consistency.
sentences.cn: 加牛奶至一种柔滑可滴的黏稠度.

sentences.en: Add water and mix with a knife to a doughy consistency.
sentences.cn: 加水用刀搅拌成黏稠状。

sentences.en: Beat the eggs up to a frothy consistency.
sentences.cn: 把鸡蛋打成黏稠泡沫状。

sentences.en: Cognitive consonance is a consistency between the knowledge , ideas and beliefs .
sentences.cn: 认识一致是知识、思想和信念之间的一致。

sentences.en: Cognitive consonance is a consistency between the knowledge, ideas and beliefs.
sentences.cn: 认识一致是知识 、 思想和信念之间的一致.

sentences.en: Dilute the paint with water until it is the consistency of milk.
sentences.cn: 用水把涂料稀释到牛奶般的稠度。

sentences.en: He scores goals with remark-able consistency.
I added a little milk to mix the dough to the right consistency.
sentences.cn: 我加了一点儿牛奶，好让面团稠度适中。

sentences.en: Knead the dough to the right consistency.
sentences.cn: 把面团揉到适合的黏稠度.

sentences.en: Mix flour and milk to the right consistency.
sentences.cn: 请把面粉和牛奶调到适当的稠度.

sentences.en: She has played with great consistency all season.
sentences.cn: 她整个赛季表现相当稳定。

sentences.en: She scores goals with remarkable consistency.
sentences.cn: 她以非凡的连贯性进球得分。

sentences.en: The chutney should be a thick, pulpy consistency.
sentences.cn: 酸辣酱应该是浓稠的软糊状。

sentences.en: The essential element in the mores and in personal morality is consistency.
sentences.cn: 民风民德,以及个人道德中首要的因素是其连贯性.

words.tran_cn: 始终如一的，一致的；坚持的

phrases.tran_cn: 內部一致性；内部相容性
n. 标准稠度；正常稠度；正常调度

trans.tran_en: how thick, smooth etc a substance is
